amendment.description: An amendment to provide $2.5 million to the State of Nevada for the Yucca Mountain Nuclear Waste Repository.

action.text: Mr. Frelinghuysen raised a point of order against the Heck amendment (A041). Mr. Frelinghuysen stated that the amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Heck.
